recipes.title: Biryani
recipes.instructions: Wash the rice and soak it in water for 30 minutes., Heat ghee in a large pan and fry sliced onions until golden brown., Add ginger garlic paste, tomatoes, and spices and cook for 2-3 minutes., Add chicken and cook until browned., Add yogurt and cook for another 5 minutes., In a separate pot, boil water and add rice., Cook rice until it's 3/4th done., Layer rice and chicken mixture in a large pot, starting and ending with rice., Add mint and coriander leaves on top., Cover pot with a lid and cook on low heat for 15-20 minutes or until rice is fully cooked.
